file_content.text: Don't be so surprised. Where you go, I go. We are indivisible now.
The Gravestone. Not entirely what I'd envisioned.
I thought you were just a dream.
It's really you.
You're going to tell me what you know about it.
Details. Now.
What do you know about it?
Tell me about this ship.
I thought I had made it clear that I intend to help you, and here you are acting the aggressor.
You have had a taste of my son's Empire, his reach. And Vaylin--she does not believe in restraint. We can only defeat Arcann if we work together.
I'll hear you out.
I'm listening.
You sound like you know how to accomplish that.
You have a plan, don't you?
I don't buy for one moment that you're on my side.
I don't trust you.
Were the roles reversed, perhaps I would be skeptical as well. But what if I could prove my sincerity?
Would you continue to see me as your eternal nemesis, or would you open your eyes to the truth?
Get ready for a fight, people! They found us! Skytroopers breaching the entrance!
Did you guide us here?
Is it part of your plan?
The real question to ask is: "Why are we here?"
I know rumors. Half-truths. I won't bother you with them.
I assure you, I am real, as is my intent to see you flourish.
Now that you know what my children are capable of, you are better prepared for the trials our partnership will bring.
I'm listening.
I'd like to hear more.
They're persistent, but they don't scare me.
I don't fear them.
This wasn't the sort of partnership I had in mind.
I didn't sign up for this.
You do not need to prove anything to me. I am more aware of your potential than you are.
Nor I. But we can still forge meaningful opportunities from our entwined fates.
We will face many challenges together. But when the time comes, you will only need to ask and unlimited power will course through you.
Thank you. It's simple, really.
I know... aspects. But an unknown factor remains at the center of all of it--you.
You must be willing to accept my help for what it is. And you will have to come to this acceptance sooner than you think.
